level.heading: Bureau of Traffic Adjudication and Bureau of Parking and Enforcement established.
Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 2-104, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 50-2301.01.
For D.C. Law 13-289, see notes following § 50-401.

level.heading: Transfer of Functions
level.text: The functions of the Department of Transportation were transferred to the Department of Public Works by Reorganization Plan No. 4 of 1983, effective March 1, 1984.
